name: ecoDUSTRIAL™ Non-Skid Coatings
description: ecoFINISH® ecoDUSTRIAL™ Non-Skid Coatings are vastly superior to traditional slip-resistant coatings in both product materials and in their application method. ecoDUSTRIAL™ Non-Skid Coatings are thermoplastic polymeric coating finishes applied utilizing the ecoFINISH™ thermal flame spray installation process. The application yields an extremely well-adhered finish onto concrete, metal, and fiberglass surfaces. The installation process is completely portable, able to be applied at virtually any location to create a protective skid-resistant barrier that will last for many years.
